channel.title: BBC Sport | Golf | UK Edition
channel.description: The latest BBC Golf news plus scores, results, calendar, blogs and analysis on all the worlds major golf tournaments, along with video and audio.
channel.copyright: Copyright: (C) British Broadcasting Corporation, see http://news.bbc.co.uk/sport1/hi/help/rss/4517815.stm for terms and conditions of reuse

item.title: McIlroy will play at Irish Open
item.description: Rory McIlroy confirms he will play at the 2012 Irish Open, despite a clash of dates with a major tournament in the United States.

item.title: Dates unveiled for 2014 Ryder Cup
item.description: The 2014 Ryder Cup at Gleneagles will take place from 26-28 September.

item.title: United States claim World Cup win
item.description: Matt Kuchar and Gary Woodland combine for six birdies as the United States win the World Cup by two shots from England and Germany.

item.title: Otto clinches South African Open
item.description: Hennie Otto survives a nerve-wracking final few holes to win his home South African Open by one shot at Serengeti Golf Club in Ekurhuleni.

item.title: Westwood rejoins PGA tour in 2012
item.description: World number three Lee Westwood will divide his time between Europe and America next year when he rejoins the PGA Tour in 2012.

item.title: Woods wins Presidents Cup for USA
item.description: Tiger Woods earns the winning point as the United States beat the International team 19-15 in the Presidents Cup in Melbourne.

item.title: Mulroy wins Alfred Dunhill title
item.description: South African Garth Mulroy wins the Alfred Dunhill Championship at Leopard Creek Country Club holding off a challenge from Scotland's George Murray.

item.title: From firing range to driving range - Monty swings by Afghanistan
item.description: Colin Montgomerie helps transform firing ranges into driving ranges on a trip to Afghanistan to support troops and promote golf in the country.

item.title: World Cup fails to inspire
item.description: BBC Sport golf correspondent Iain Carter on why tournament lacks sparkle

item.title: Back to school for Duval
item.description: Former world number one shows talent and humility in the battle to regain his Tour card
